name: Otami Blue Bed Set- King
description:
From a remote Mexican village high in the mountains of Hidalgo, the Otami people create these beautiful pieces of art- expressions of their incredible culture and heritage. All their knowledge, their relationship with nature and the cosmos, their religion, their philosophy of life are reflected in the colors, textures, and shapes of every single embroidery.

Each piece is carefully hand embroidered by women artisans with breathtaking colors and fantastical animal like creatures.

Each piece is one-of-a-kind, and and embroidered onto organic, unbleached cotton canvas. An absolute treasure, and beautiful addition to a space.

Directly sourced from a small co-op of artisans, your purchase helps to empower families and support the Otami way of life.

Made of Organic cotton.

Comes with spread and two shams.

Spread measures: 8.5'x 25" // Shams measure: 26"x20" (66cmx51cm)

For cleaning, we recommend using a trusted dry cleaning professional.

Free International Shipping. Please see our terms for more info.

Please note that with all handmade items, textiles may have irregularities. This adds to the unique charm of each piece, and is not considered a defect.

name: Vintage Suzani Textile
description:
Gorgeous Afghani Suzani textile that can be used anywhere in the home.

Traditionally used as a bride's dowry, these vintage pieces were lovingly hand stitched using luscious silk thread onto a silk base. One is typically started each time a girl is born, and as soon as the bride-to-be is old enough, she began working on it herself.

One of my favorite back stories about the suzani is that embroidered into almost every piece is an intentional "mistake". It was believed that only God can create perfection, so if you look close enough at each piece, you will undoubtedly find and incomplete pattern, distorted motif...a deliberate error of humility.

Made of silk. Measures 43x43in

Professional Dry Cleaning strongly recommended.

Free International Shipping. Please see our terms for more info.

Please note that with all handmade items, this throw will may have signs of wear and minor imperfections. This adds to the unique charm of each piece, and is not considered a defect.

name: The Angela- Vintage Sari Kantha Quilt
description:
One-of-a-kind quilt that is sure to make a statement in your home. One side features a totally retro graphic design, and the reverse offers a totally different look!

Women from the West Bengal region traditionally take their most beautiful saris and arrange the pieces together to make the most unique quilts- sewn together with the classic "kantha" stitch.

Made of cotton.

Fits a twin, but when laid widthwise, can be used as a bedspread on a king.

Shown paired with our Grey Ikat Kantha Pillows.

Machine wash cold, line dry.

Free International Shipping. Please see our terms for more info.

Please note that with all handmade items, this quilt will may have signs of wear and minor imperfections. This adds to the unique charm of each piece, and is not considered a defect.

name: Vintage Hmong Pillow -Small Boudoir-
description:
The Hmong are a small tribe of Chinese people that live in the hills of Vietnam, Thailand, and Cambodia.

This gorgeous fabric is scarce and highly valued, as only a few village families are still producing them in the traditional way. Each piece, made of cotton and hemp, is painstakingly printed by hand with carved wood pattern blocks. The dye used is home grown, and made of natural indigo.

The fabric is more than 50 years old and is in great condition. I sourced it in Thailand from a local family, and it is fairly traded to ensure that the people making this beautiful fabric see the fruits of their labor.

Small Boudoir Pillow- 
Measures 12x16in (30x40cm)

Made of cotton and hemp, hidden zipper.

Separate high quality poly-fill insert is included and removable.

Take care, as this fabric uses indigo dye. Professional dry cleaning highly recommended.

Free International Shipping. Please see our terms for more info.

Please note that with all handmade items, this pillow may have minor imperfections. This adds to the unique charm of each piece, and is not considered a defect.

name: Suzani Silk Pillow
description:
The term Suzani means "needlework"--specifically, the exquisite cotton thread embroidery panels made by women in Central Asia. Traditionally this embroidery work began at the birth of a daughter and continued, with the help of family and friends, until the bride's dowry was complete. As the Soviet era ended and Westerners discovered Central Asian folk arts, the price of antique suzanis skyrocketed.

Suzanis are genuine folk art, stitched by hand in the traditional manner. Once used as coverlets for the bridal bed, these textiles are highly prized and collectible.

Suzani Pillow; Silk embroidery on a silk base.

Measures 16x16in (40x40cm)

Linen Back; zip closure, insert not included. 

Dry cleaning only.

Made in Afghanistan.

Free International Shipping. Please see our terms for more info.
